If we assume μ1 and μ2 are independent, then under a wide range of assumptions:

Standard error = $\sqrt{var(\mu_{1} - \mu_{2})}$
 
$=\sqrt{ var(x_{1})/N_{1} + var(x_{2})/N_{2} }$
